Navigate to https://textpad.surge.sh/ (a free online text editor).
Wait for the page to load completely.
Click on the text area to focus it.
Type the following content:

# Welcome to Eko Playground!

This is a demonstration of browser automation using AI.

## Features:
- Natural language task descriptions
- Automatic action planning
- Visual browser feedback
- Screenshot capture

## Generated by Eko AI
Date: [current date will be added]

---
*Powered by Eko - Empowering language to transform human words into action.*

After typing, take a screenshot of the result.
